data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 1,500 believers in West Sikkim to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of West Sikkim, Sikkim, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 1,500 believers find a person of peace today among the 134,900 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in West Sikkim, Sikkim, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in West Sikkim, Sikkim, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Gyalshing
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Gyalshing, Sikkim, India.
There are 136,400 people living in the county of West Sikkim. Only about 1,500 might be believers.
Father, move the 1,500 believers in the county of West Sikkim to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 136,400 people living in the county of West Sikkim.
